name: Order Stronghold
uniques: [+1 Food] on [Fresh water] tiles once [Construction] is discovered
Cannot be built on bonus resource
[+1 Food] on [non-fresh water] tiles once [Physics] is discovered
Can also be built on tiles adjacent to fresh water
Cannot be built on luxury resource
[+1 Food] on [Fresh water] tiles once [Mathematics] is discovered
Cannot be built on strategic resource
[+1 Food] on [non-fresh water] tiles once [Civil Service] is discovered
Can be built just outside your borders

civilopediaText: Constructing it will take over the tiles around it and assign them to your closest city

uniques.name: Village
uniques.quote: 'If there is anything in this world about which I know positively nothing, it is agriculture.'
